title: Rhyme Time
description: An interactive matching game where kindergarten students match rhyming word pairs, developing phonemic awareness and rhyme recognition skills essential for early reading.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonemic Awareness
Rhyme Recognition
learningObjectives: Recognize words that share ending sounds
Connect visual images with rhyming words

controls.label: New Game
controls.description: Start a new game with shuffled rhyming pairs

controls.label: Card Click
controls.description: Select cards to match rhyming pairs

assumptions: User has mouse or touchscreen input
Browser supports Web Speech API for audio
limitations: Regional accents may affect rhyme perception
Requires vocabulary knowledge to recognize pictures
